task.title: How you use the RUNTIMESTATISTICS attribute

step.cmd: To use the RUNTIMESTATISTICS attribute in ij, turn on and off RUNTIMESTATISTICS using the SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS() system procedure (see the for more information):

Turn on statistics timing using the SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_STATISTICS_TIMING system procedure (see the for more information). If you do not turn on statistics timing, you will see the statement execution plan only, and not the timing information.

taskbody.result: Although the syntax is different, the basic steps for working with RUNTIMESTATISTICS are the same in a Java program.
taskbody.postreq: If you are working in ij, set the display width to 5000 or another high number:MaximumDisplayWidth 5000
